Interface com.chimu.form.query.QueryExpression

public interface QueryExpression
A QueryExpression is anything that can be evaluated during the evaluation of a Query. This falls into primarily the following types:
  • Conditions
  • Constants
  • Variables

See Also:
Condition, Constant, QueryVar

Method Index

putExpressionValueInto(SqlBuilder)
Add your query part to the SqlBuilder
